paper.title: Limitations of the Kerberos authentication system
paper.venue: ACM Special Interest Group on Data Communication

keywords.keyword: Generic Security Service Algorithm for Secret Key Transaction

paper.abstract: The Kerberos authentication system, a part of MITu0027s Project Athena, has been adopted by other organizations. Despite Kerberosu0027s many strengths, it has a number of limitations and some weaknesses. Some are due to specifics of the MIT environment; others represent deficiencies in the protocol design. We discuss a number of such problems, and present solutions to some of them. We also demonstrate how special-purpose cryptographic hardware may be needed in some cases.
